test_mpld3 module¶

test_mpld3.michse()¶

This example shows how mpld3 can display images using plt.imshow(). It also includes the mouse position plugin, so that the mouse coordinates are displayed in the lower-right corner.

Image with Mouse Position

This example shows how mpld3 can display images using plt.imshow(). It also includes the mouse position plugin, so that the mouse coordinates are displayed in the lower-right corner.

(Source code)
